title: Ep - 164 - KATE CHASTAIN FROM BELOW DECK REVIEWS BRAVO SHOWS
description:
Kate Chastain, Chef Stewardess on Below Deck, reviews Real Housewives of New York, Southern Charm, Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, and The Staircase. She gives her opinions on everything from puppy gate, Thomas Ravenal, and Luann’s ego. 


Candice and Kayla from Directionally Challenged podcast review this season of The Bachelorette. 


Janet (Blanca) from Texicanas talks about her argument with Mayra and whether she is getting calls from people in San Antonio eager to also appear on the show. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca
